entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
